sentences.sContent: Some patients state that lesions develop at the site of antecedent trauma.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some patients state that lesions develop at the site of antecedent trauma.
sentences.sCn: 一些患者指出，病灶出现在先前的创伤部位。

sentences.sContent: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.sContent_eng: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.sCn: 代名词必须有一个，也只能有一个先行词，以免造成模糊或模棱两可。

sentences.sContent: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.sContent_eng: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.sCn: 用户然后可以使用指定的条件（比如支持和置信界限），或在先前的序列上设置限制来分析该格子。

remMethod.val: ante(在…前面) + ced(走) + ent → 走在前面的 → 先行的

trans.tranOther: an event, organization, or thing that is similar to the one you have mentioned but existed earlier
